shortdesc.ph: Queries the maximum frame rate supported by the device for screen sharing.
Queries the maximum frame rate supported by the device during screen sharing.
Queries the maximum supported frame rate for screen sharing on the device.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: In screen sharing scenarios, if you want to enable high frame rates (e.g., 60 fps) but are unsure whether the device supports it, you can call this method to query the maximum frame rate supported by the device. If high frame rates are not supported, you can lower the frame rate of the screen sharing stream accordingly to ensure the expected sharing experience.
